attributes.action: End the UK’s adoption of UN Agenda 2030 & the 17 Sustainable Development Goals
attributes.additional_details: We think that ending the UK’s adoption of the United Nations Agenda 2030 and the 17 Sustainable Development Goals is important for the sovereign governance of our country.
attributes.background: We are concerned that the UK's adoption of the United Nations Agenda 2030 and the 17 Sustainable Development Goals may lead in the future to undemocratic powers being given over our nation’s sovereignty.
